[DQC.US.0207.10727] The filer has reported a schedule of investments and has provided subtotals for the InvestmentTypeAxis. The filer has also reported values for the InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration concept. The values reported for the InvestmentTypeExtensibleEnumeration concept should be used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or should roll up in a domain-member hierarchy to the member used as a subtotal. The following extensible enumeration values have been reported but are not being used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or can be reconciled to this axis. FirstLienSecuredRevolvingLoanMember, ClassBUnitsMember, FirstLienSecuredTermLoanCMember, FirstLienSecuredBridgeLoanMember, ClassALLCInterestsMember, PriorityFirstLienSecuredDelayedDrawLoanMember, FirstLienSecuredDelayedDrawLoanMember, UnsecuredLoanMember, LimitedPartnerInterestsMember, ClassAUnitsMember, SuperPriorityFirstLienSecuredTermLoanMember, CommonUnitsMember, PriorityFirstLienSecuredTermLoanMember, SecondLienSecuredTermLoanMember, FirstLienSecuredTermLoanAMember, LLCInterestsMember, CommonClassAMember, SeriesUnitsMember, SuperSeniorPriorityFirstLienSecuredTermLoanMember, ClassCommonUnitsMember, SeniorPreferredUnitsMember, CommonAUnitsMember, FirstLienSecuredTermLoanBMember, SubordinatedUnsecuredTermLoanMember. Please ensure that these values are used as members on the InvestmentTypeAxis or are descendants of one of the following members us-gaap:SubordinatedDebtMember, us-gaap:DebtSecuritiesMember, us-gaap:EquitySecuritiesMember.
